name: Disconnect (DisconnectTeam)
description:
Disconnect is a first-person puzzle game inspired by titles such as Half-Life and Portal. In this game you are tasked with progressing through various levels by using wires to power a variety of devices.

The current version of our game is a prototype, and was developed by 4 design students over the course of 6 weeks as a proof-of-concept for a puzzle-adventure game.
